sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"停留，逗留"之意。
means: remain ： 指某人或某物仍留在原处或保持原来的状态。
linger ： 着重因愉快的事而使人不愿离开。
stay ： 普通用词，多指人在某地暂时逗留。有时可指较长时间的居留。

sentence.Network_en: When apartheid is over the maladies will linger on.
sentence.Network_cn: 废除了种族隔离政策后痼疾依然存在。

sentence.Network_en: Customers are welcome to linger over coffee until around midnight.
sentence.Network_cn: 客人尽可以喝着咖啡逗留到午夜左右。

sentence.Network_en: Don't linger away your holidays. Try to find something useful to do.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要虚度假日, 尽量找些有意义的事做.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... languor n. 无精打彩， 倦怠 linger v. 逗留 misty a. 模糊的.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... linen 亚麻布 linger 徘徊 lining 衬□.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... ling 石南 linger 逗留，徘徊；拖延 lingering 拖延的，依依不舍的.
[DVDRip] 《蝴蝶飞》(Linger)(DVDRip) [全版] 中文字幕◎译　　名　蝴蝶飞 ◎片　　名　Hu die fei ◎年　　代　2008 ◎国　　家　香港 ◎类 …

list.abs: 余的意思_百度知道 ... 余业[ remainding merits] 余音[ lingering sound] 余音绕梁[ leave a lasting and pleasant impression].
余的意思_百度知道 ... 余火[ ember] 余悸[ lingering fear] 余角[ hade].
情_互动百科 ... 【nature;disposition】 性格 【lingering affection】 情丝,缠绵的情意 【feeling】 泛指感情.
艺术词汇 ... 相声 cross-talk 韵味 lingering charm 小品 witty skits.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'dwell, abide'): frequentative of obsolete leng 'prolong', of Germanic origin; related to German längen 'make long(er'), also to long

entry.def: When something such as an idea, feeling, or illness lingers, it continues to exist for a long time, often much longer than expected.

example.ex: The scent of her perfume lingered on in the room...
example.tran: 她的香水味道在房间里久久不散。

example.ex: A guerrilla war has lingered into its fourth decade...
example.tran: 一场游击战已经持续了30多年。

entry.tran: 留恋；不愿离开；继续逗留
entry.def: If you linger somewhere, you stay there for a longer time than is necessary, for example because you are enjoying yourself.

example.ex: Customers are welcome to linger over coffee until around midnight...
example.tran: 客人尽可以喝着咖啡逗留到午夜左右。

example.ex: I lingered on in Atlanta for a few days, spending much of my time with an artist friend...
example.tran: 我在亚特兰大又逗留了几天，大部分时候都和一位搞艺术的朋友在一起。

means.word_mean: 1. remain present although waning or gradually dying;

sentences.sentence: "The high school students like to loiter in the Central Square"
"Who is this man that is hanging around the department?"
"The shy student lingered in the corner"

auth_sentence.content: PCBs were banned, yet linger in the environment.
auth_sentence.res_content: PCBs were banned, yet linger in the environment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: PCBs were banned, yet linger in the environment.

auth_sentence.content: The first linger away their lives in perpetual drudgery.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first linger away their lives in perpetual drudgery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first linger away their lives in perpetual drudgery.

auth_sentence.content: In this case memories of the fun do linger.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this case memories of the fun do linger.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this case memories of the fun do linger.

Sentence.sentence: But while printing quickly caused the hand written book to die out, handwriting lingered on (继续存在) well into the 16th century.
Sometimes old technology lingers for centuries because of its symbolic power.
Although most people admitted to some lingering rivalry, it was rarely strong enough to end the relationship.
About one eighth of them admitted to lingering bitter feelings
Lingering racism If the Obama effect is positive for African Americans, how is it affecting their white compatriots (同胞)

sentences.en: The smell of the gas oil lingered in the house.
sentences.cn: 屋里仍然飘溢着汽油味。

jushi.english: The smell of her perfume lingered in the empty house.
jushi.chinese: 空屋里仍然飘溢着她的香水味。

jushi.english: Mother told him not to linger on the way home.
jushi.chinese: 妈妈告诉他不要在回家的路上逗留。
